item.title: Serial vs Concurrent Queues
item.content:encoded:
Title: Serial vs Concurrent Queues Date: 2026-01-19 Tags: Swift, Concurrency, Interview Summary: Clear explanation of serial and concurrent queues with examples.

Serial vs Concurrent Queues

This note is part of my interview preparation.

What is a Serial Queue?

A serial queue executes one task at a time, in FIFO order.

let serialQueue = DispatchQueue(label: "com.example.serial")

serialQueue.async {
    print("Task 1")
}

serialQueue.async {
    print("Task 2")
}

##Key points

  • Only one task runs at a time
  • Order is preserved
  • Thread is not guaranteed to be the same
